---
title: "Baby Names"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(showtext)
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(patchwork)
library(mosaic)
library(broom)
library(janitor)
library(wordcloud)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(wordcloud2)

tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2022-03-22')
babynames <- tuesdata$babynames
```

```{r}
df <- babynames %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  group_by(name) %>%
  summarise(n=sum(n)) %>%
  arrange(-n) %>%
  ungroup()

dfwomen <- babynames %>%
  filter(sex=="F") %>%
  group_by(name) %>%
  summarise(n=sum(n)) %>%
  arrange(-n) %>%
  ungroup()

set.seed(123)

wordcloud2(df)
wordcloud2(dfwomen)
```


```{r}
letters <- babynames %>%
  mutate(firstLetter = substr(name, 1, 1)) %>%
  group_by(firstLetter) %>%
  summarise(count=sum(n)) %>%
  ungroup()

letters %>% ggplot(aes(x=firstLetter, y=count, fill=count)) +
  geom_col(stat='identity') +
  theme(legend.position="none") +
  scale_fill_viridis_c()
```
```{r}
top_10 <- babynames %>%
  group_by(name) %>%
  summarise(count=sum(n)) %>%
  arrange(-count) %>%
  slice(1:10)

top_year <- babynames %>% 
  filter(name=="John"| name=="James" | name=="Robert" | name=="Michael" | name=="Mary" | name=="William" | name=="David" | name=="Joseph" | name=="Richard"| name=="Charles") %>%
  arrange(-n) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=year,y=as.integer(n), color=n)) +
  geom_line() + 
  theme(legend.position="none") +
  facet_wrap(~name)

top_year
```
